text: Had it not been the grace of Allah upon you (O Muhammad) and His Mercy, even if a group of them had decided that they would mislead you, but in fact they did not mislead except themselves, and they did not harm you in the least. Allah has sent down to you the book (the Qurâ€™an), the wisdom, and taught you what you did not know. The Grace of Allah upon you (Muhammad) is great
